titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Reverend Eugene Smathers Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

chronitem.event: Born in Bath County, Kentucky
A.B. Transylvania College
B.D.Louisville Presbyterian Seminary
Married Louoile Boydston of Berrysville, Ark.
Pastor of Calvary Presbyterian Church of Big Lick, Tn. near Crossville.
Warren H. Wilson House of Health Constructed
Author of "I Work in the Cumberlands", Fellowship of Southern Churchmen
Interracial and interfaith work camps held at Big Lick
Special Lecturer in rural life and leadership at the School of Religion, Vanderbilt University
"Primer for Friends of the Soil", Friends of the Soil
"Study Guide for Use with Bailey's Holy Earth",
"Stewards of the Soil", Friends of the Soil
D.D., Honorary Degree, Centre College, Ky.
Rural Paster of the Year for Tennessee
President of Natl. Presbyterian Town and Country Fellowship
Chairman of Committee on Natl. Missions, Presbytery of Cumberland Mtn., and of the Synod of Mid-South
Chairman, Cuaberland County Rural Health Council
Member of Bd. of Directors of Uplands Sanatorium
Member of Exec. Comm. of Natl. Presby. Rural Fellowship
Chairman of Bd. of Cumberland Co. Farmers Cooperative
Elected Moderator by the General Aaseably of the United Presbyterian Church, U.S.A.
Died, Big Lick, Tn.

scopecontent.head: Table of Contents
scopecontent.p: The Smathers Collection is divided into two series: a regular, and a miscellaneous series. The "regular" series includes Boxes 1-39, and contains the following: 1) Smathers' incoming correspondence; 2) Smathers' outgoing correspondence; and 3) Smathers' sermons and sermon materials.
The miscellaneous series, Miscellaneous Boxes 1-22, includes the following:
1) various materials collected by Smathers, and listed according to subject;
2) articles, papers and pamphlets by Smathers, plus publications about Smathers and Big Lick;
3) Board of National Missions Monthly Reports by Smathers and by others, and miscellaneous reports on various projects;
4) pamphlets collected by Eugene Smathers, arranged by publisher

did.unittitle: First name only, fragments, initials, illegible, unsigned

note.p: Includes book orders and inquiries, consumers book cooperative, Lowther Co., machinery and supply orders and inquiries, orders for smathers' pamphlets, and for Christmas greens.

Boxes Misc. 1-9: Various materials collected by Smathers, arranged by subject.

Box Misc. 10: Articles and papers by Smathers, arranged chronologically, 1930-68, plus no dates; Pamphlets by Smathers; publications about Smathers and Big Lick, 1921-68, plus no dates; Board of National Missions - Monthly Reports by Smathers, 1932-68, plus miscellaneous reports by Smathers; Board of National Missions - Monthly Reports by others, 1944-54.
Box Misc. 11: Board of National Missions - Monthly Reports by others, 1955-68, and no dates; Board of National Missions reports on various projects; also Board miscellaneous reports.
Boxes Misc. 11-22: Pamphlets collected by Eugene Smathers; pamphlet fragments and no publishers; also two photographs (fragments etc. and photographs - Box 22)
